rows.label: xs01040100_MSG0001
rows.name: And here we are—the BLADE barracks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040100_MSG0002
rows.name:
Consider yourself our guest until we finish getting you
registered. Feel free to come and go as you please.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040100_JNK0010
rows.name: Show Interest

rows.label: xs01040100_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask about registration.

rows.label: xs01040100_JNK0020
rows.name: Look Away

rows.label: xs01040100_SEL0021
rows.name: Frown and say nothing.

rows.label: xs01040100_MSG0003
rows.name: I think I can answer that one.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040100_MSG0004
rows.name: Is there a problem here?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040100_MSG0005_m
rows.name: So...you must be the latest rescue.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040100_MSG0005_f
rows.name: So...you must be the latest rescue.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040100_MSG0006
rows.name: Secretary Nagi![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040100_MSG0007
rows.name: Ms. Koo. Chipper as always, I see.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040100_MSG0008
rows.name: What can I say? Pep is my middle name.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040100_MSG0009
rows.name:
I ran into Doug Barrett on the way here,
and he didn't seem quite so upbeat.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040100_MSG0010
rows.name: Anything about today's flight I should know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040100_MSG0011
rows.name: N-no...? Nothing to worry about.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040100_MSG0012
rows.name: Good. Be sure it stays that way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040100_MSG0013
rows.name:
More importantly, Elma—you found another one.
Excellent work out there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040100_MSG0014
rows.name: Just doing my job, Mr. Secretary.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040100_MSG0015
rows.name: Now, as for officially registering our new citizen here...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040100_MSG0016
rows.name: Why don't we talk inside?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040100_MSG0017
rows.name: There's a lot of ground to cover—it could take some time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040100_MSG0018
rows.name: Ah yes, of course.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040100_MSG0019
rows.name:
Forgive me—you must be weary from
the stasis and your journey back to us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040100_MSG0020
rows.name: Please—after you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040100_MSG0021
rows.name: I'll put on some tea.[ST:wait ]
